meta.name: Rock Paper Scissors
meta.description: In Rock Paper Scissors, titular characters, Rock, Paper and Scissors, are a trio of best friends and roommates who lovingly compete over everything in hilarious but mostly wildly absurd ways. Throughout season one, the trio will go to extremes playing hide-and-seek around the world, running from the birthday police, defending the world from an alien invasion, going head-to-head with the Rat Bros and more.

videos.title: Scissors Sees an Inspirational Sports Movie
The Fart Joke Debate
videos.overview: When Rock, Scissors, and Pencil learn that Paper dislikes fart jokes, they search for one that'll make him laugh.

videos.title: The First Lou Episode
videos.overview: To get their landlord to lower their rent, the trio tries to help him achieve his impossible dream.

videos.title: Scissors Gets a Job
videos.overview: When Scissors runs out of money, he tries to become a janitor but discovers that the job involves way more skill than he initially thought. Meanwhile, Rock and Paper try to motivate Scissors in an unusual way.

videos.title: The Arctic
videos.overview: After the heater breaks, the trio's apartment freezes. Paper tries to save his friends. Lou attends Landlord Con.

videos.title: Paper's Big Lie
videos.overview: Paper falls in love with his next door neighbor Pencil, and when he becomes desperate to impress her, he lies about being a proper inventor. Things spill over when he ends up being the Earth's only hope against an alien invasion led by hippos.

videos.title: Weekend Story
videos.overview: Scissors helps Paper have a weekend interesting enough to impress Pencil; Rock buys a hat.

videos.title: Scrubs
videos.overview: Paper tries to get respect by dressing as a doctor; Scissors tries to get more by dressing as a basketball star.

videos.title: Key Limes
videos.overview: Our trio go on an unnecessarily action-packed adventure with Paper's sister, Sandpaper, to get seven key limes.

videos.title: Prank War
videos.overview: Paper joins Rock and Scissors in a prank war against the Rat Bros and Pencil, but Pencil has a secret weapon.

videos.title: Pencil Comes Over
videos.overview: When Pencil comes over to watch a horror movie, Paper worries he'll be too scared to handle it.

videos.title: Hide and Seek
videos.overview: The trio plays a game of hide and seek that spans the globe and takes decades to complete.

videos.title: Paper's Secret Weapon
videos.overview: Rock and Scissors learn that Paper invents better when angry; so, as his friends, they try to enrage him.

videos.title: Birthday Police
videos.overview: When Scissors lies about Rock's birthday to get free cake, the trio must go on the run from the Birthday Police.

videos.title: Putty
videos.overview: Rock, Paper, and Scissors try to prove they shouldn't bereplaced by their incredible new friend, Putty.

videos.title: The Susan
videos.overview: Rock, Paper, and Scissors try to transform their unusual car, The Susan, into a prize-winning vehicle.

videos.title: Eyebrows
videos.overview: Paper gives Rock mechanical eyebrows to help with an audition; Scissors has an adventure with stand-ins.

videos.title: Six Pieces of Turkey
videos.overview: When Rock's TV dinner isn't as plentiful as advertised, hefights for justice. Scissors works for the company.

videos.title: The Wind
videos.overview: There's a light wind, and Paper is far from home. Will Rock and Scissors save him or will Paper blow away forever?

videos.title: National Paper Day
videos.overview: Paper learns about a few eccentric holidays like Rock Day.

videos.title: Pogo Sticks
videos.overview: To attend the Rat Bros' party, the trio tries to get their hands on the latest cool item: pogo sticks.

videos.title: Car Wash
videos.overview: Rock tries to get a job at Evil Robot Corp. Paper and Scissors see if the company is exactly what it sounds like.

videos.title: The Holiday Picture
videos.overview: The trio's perfect holiday photo is ruined by a ghost who follows them everywhere.

videos.title: Key Limes
videos.overview: The trio goes on an action-packed adventure with Paper's sister, Sandpaper, to get seven key limes.

videos.title: Pogo Sticks
videos.overview: The trio get their hands on pogo sticks.

videos.title: Car Wash
videos.overview: Rock tries to get a job at Evil Robot Corp.

videos.title: Franz Roll and the Lost Rainbow Hot Pants of Atraxes the Apple Bottomed
videos.overview: Rock quests for an ancient artifact in order to prove he is worthy of working with his modeling role model, Franz Roll; Paper and Scissors compete to be more supportive of Rock in the hopes that one of them will head his entourage.

videos.title: Paper and Pencil Tell a Joke
videos.overview: Paper and Pencil tell a kind of funny joke at a party and chase the feeling of people finding them funny by telling it again and again.

videos.title: Scissors' Orchestra
videos.overview: Scissors hires an orchestra to follow him around and score his life.

videos.title: Shoot
videos.overview: Rock, Paper, and Scissors' old friend Shoot comes back to town, ready for more of his favorite activity: exhaustingly annoying competitions.

videos.title: Rock's First Day of Work
videos.overview: Rock starts his job as Franz Roll's assistant and learns just how demanding his role model is.
